DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to compare the values of cerebral tissue oxygenation measured simultaneously using laser light (FORE-SIGHT) and LED (INVOS) cerebral oximeters.
DOC.brief_title: Cerebral Tissue Oxygenation Values in Newborns Measured Using Laser and LED NIRS Oximeters
DOC.criteria: Clinically stable Spontaneously breathing newborns Congenital heart defects or anomalies of central nervous system Prematurity below 32 GA Respiratory distress
